page.title: 03THE RIVER
page.content: The River Avon has often been described as the loveliest river in England and it winds its way through Stratford.It is the basis for many activities. The Stratford Marina has thirteen narrow boats for hire and are solidly booked for the summer.In the 1900's it was made into a shop, before that they used to make boats there. Fishing: To fish on the River Avon you must pay Â£2:50 to get a licence.On the river you can catch chub, perch, pike and many other types of fish. People of all ages can fish on the river and lots of people do. Raft Race: Wellsbourne Lions annual raft race,the ninth race,takes place in June and nearly 300 rafts are taking part.Money raised by sponsorship will go to local charities
